summary: The 'VA Loan Informed Disclosure Act of 2025' aims to amend existing housing legislation.  It mandates the inclusion of VA loan information in the disclosures provided to prospective FHA borrowers, thus increasing consumer awareness.  Additionally, the bill requires the Uniform Residential Loan Application to include a question regarding military service. These changes seek to improve informed decision-making for those seeking home loans and gather data on military affiliation.
